verbs.description: < p > While [ARG0: Trump ’s outreach to an adversary] [V: gets] [ARG1: positive marks] , a majority of those surveyed also express concern about deteriorating relations with traditional allies.</p >
< p > While Trump ’s outreach to an adversary gets positive marks , a majority of [ARG1: those] [V: surveyed] also express concern about deteriorating relations with traditional allies.</p >

[ARGM-ADV: < p > While Trump ’s outreach to an adversary gets positive marks] , [ARG0: a majority of those surveyed] [ARGM-DIS: also] [V: express] [ARG1: concern about deteriorating relations with traditional] allies.</p >
< p > While Trump ’s outreach to an adversary gets positive marks , a majority of those surveyed also express concern about [V: deteriorating] [ARG1: relations] with traditional allies.</p >
